name: Macro Meat
description:
MACRO MEAT

Earn as much money as you can processing meat into steaks!
Multitasking abilities is a plus!

CONTROLS: Left mouse button. ESCAPE to quit. F5 to restart.

Macro Meat was made in 2 hours as a part of a challenge.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
